mapper.sql: id, region_id, region_en, region_name, p_id, international
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_region
id,
region_id,
region_en,
region_name,
p_id,
international,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{international,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_region
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region_en = #{regionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region_name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
international = #{international,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where region_id = #{regionId}

update sys_region set region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_en = #{regionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, international = #{international,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where region_id = #{regionId}
mapper.select: select * from sys_region WHERE p_id = 0 AND international IS NOT NULL
